data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 6,282 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Abra, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Abra, Philippines.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Abra, Philippines.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Abra to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Abra, Philippines.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Sama, Southern people might believe through him.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Abra, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, 45,100 people live in the state of Abra. Please, give them 9 new simple churches this year.
Lord we pray you unite the 6,282 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Abra.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

location.name: Abra
location.cities_list: San Ramon, La Paz, Bantay, Pidigan, Tayum
location.cities_list_w_pop: San Ramon (4,054), La Paz (3,405), Bantay (2,838), Pidigan (2,734), Tayum (2,530)
